topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0 Beta: Installing the Non-KVM Region

body.p: After the Helion Lifecycle Management (HLM) is installed, the next task is to deploy the HP Helion OpenStack cloud into the non-KVM region.

Use one of the following links, depending upon which deployment model you are using:
denver. The denver deployment includes a KVM region and uses AVS networking. See Deploying the denver template.
tahoe. The tahoe deployment includes a KVM region and uses HP DCN VRS networking. See Deploying the tahoe template.
memphis. The memphis deployment includes the KVM region, ESX storage, and uses HP DCN VRS networking. See Deploying the memphis template.
sacramento. The sacramento deployment includes the KVM region, the baremetal region, ESX storage, and uses HP DCN VRS networking. See Deploying the sacramento template.
